notes: Squarespace runtime/bootstrap JS removed from page execution path.
Non-commerce requirement enforced: no checkout/payment flow retained.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace header runtime toggled body state and menu open/close interactions via site-bundle scripts.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::initMenuToggle() manages `.header--menu-open`, burger button aria state, backdrop click, link close, and Escape handling.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace image components used runtime loaders plus localized image assets and srcset metadata.
behaviors.dependency_source: Squarespace image/component runtime (removed) + local image assets
behaviors.replacement_implementation: Native browser loading (`loading="lazy"`, `src`, `srcset`, `sizes`) with localized assets kept intact; no remote runtime loader required.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace search runtime and remote index/search endpoint behavior.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js search overlay + assets/data/search-index.json generated by scripts/build_search_index.py; optional local API endpoint `/api/search` in scripts/local_backend.py.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace commerce/cart runtime updated `.sqs-cart-quantity` UI counters.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::updateCartBadge() updates `.sqs-cart-quantity` from localStorage key `vhc_local_cart_items` with no transaction logic.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace-rendered link blocks/CTAs in page markup.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: No runtime dependency required; native anchor navigation preserved.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace header runtime toggled body state and menu open/close interactions via site-bundle scripts.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::initMenuToggle() manages `.header--menu-open`, burger button aria state, backdrop click, link close, and Escape handling.

behaviors.replacement_implementation: Native browser loading (`loading="lazy"`, `src`, `srcset`, `sizes`) with localized assets kept intact; no remote runtime loader required.

behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::updateCartBadge() updates `.sqs-cart-quantity` from localStorage key `vhc_local_cart_items` with no transaction logic.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace collection listing rendered as linked cards.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: No runtime dependency required; card/link navigation preserved with existing styling.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace header runtime toggled body state and menu open/close interactions via site-bundle scripts.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::initMenuToggle() manages `.header--menu-open`, burger button aria state, backdrop click, link close, and Escape handling.

behaviors.dependency_source: Squarespace image/component runtime (removed) + local image assets
behaviors.replacement_implementation: Native browser loading (`loading="lazy"`, `src`, `srcset`, `sizes`) with localized assets kept intact; no remote runtime loader required.

behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::updateCartBadge() updates `.sqs-cart-quantity` from localStorage key `vhc_local_cart_items` with no transaction logic.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace cart root (`#sqs-cart-root`) and checkout flow container.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: cart.html now renders `#local-cart-root` informational panel: explicitly non-commerce messaging, local state reset control, and educational feedback form.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: No local non-Squarespace form backend existed; Squarespace forms runtime handled hosted submissions when present.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: cart.html feedback form (`data-local-form="site-feedback"`) handled by assets/js/local-runtime.js validation and POST `/api/forms`; persisted to `data/form-submissions.ndjson` via scripts/local_backend.py.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace header runtime toggled body state and menu open/close interactions via site-bundle scripts.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: assets/js/local-runtime.js::initMenuToggle() manages `.header--menu-open`, burger button aria state, backdrop click, link close, and Escape handling.

behaviors.existing_mechanism: Squarespace course/chapter item blocks and linked media cards.
behaviors.replacement_implementation: Native anchors and media elements retained; interaction relies on browser behavior and local runtime only for shared menu/search/cart badge UX.
